title: Arista font id
content:
Hi can anyone identify the font used in the Arista logo (the text below the A icon), or maybe point me in the direction of a similar font? I’ve attached two examples, one shows the font slightly less bold than the other but they seem to be essentially the same.

JH

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830100427im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/45DancinUSpromo_3612.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830100427im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/595_5323.GIF)

 [‹ Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830100427/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47018 "Go to previous forum topic") [beer label font id ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830100427/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47027 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jazzhustler

comments.content: I see some ’Italia’, but maybe not.

It is close to Italia. Close enough for my purposes, so thanks.

JH
